string.text: Got anything to drink? If you do, well...I'll make sure there are some 'accounting errors' in the ammo inventory.

We've got a surplus of these old uniforms around. Most of them won't fit any new joinees, and they'll definitely try to trade up anyway when they get the chance. I'll let one slip to you for a few bottles of Nemiroff.
Hey stalker, today's your lucky day. We got a new shipment of Berills and seems like there was a discrepancy. We have one left over, as you see. It can be yours..for a price.

Hey stalker, I've been hearing about the good work you've done for the scientists here. Long story short - some specops guy accidentally got electrocuted, and he's left his set of armor with us. If you don't mind the smell of burnt hair, it'll serve you really well. You know the drill...bottles up front.
Thanks, stalker. We'll toast to you.

The vodka isn't all for drinking, you know - it's really useful to sanitize tools. Either way, being out here is boring without something to snack on. Bring me something and I'll slip you some armor inserts.

As an unofficial part of the sample collection compensation program, I have put up for exchange a limited selection of our field medical supplies. Should you find yourself in possession of rare mutant samples, we will gladly exchange some of our medical items for them.
Excellent work, stalker. Make full use of those supplies.
